statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, password FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE authentication_token IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT device_name, access_level FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE user_id = 1234 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, authentication_token FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE password LIKE '%123%' AND access_level = 'Admin' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE user_id IN (5678, 9012) AND device_name LIKE 'Sensor%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, access_level FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE password = 'password123' AND access_level IN ('Admin', 'User') ORDER BY user_id, device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_table;
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM access_control_table WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_info_table ORDER BY last_connection_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_info_table WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_type, last_connection_time FROM device_info_table WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT * FROM access_control_table WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, access_level FROM access_control_table WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, last_connection_time FROM device_info_table WHERE last_connection_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_connection_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level, access_time FROM access_control_table WHERE access_level = 3 AND access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT device_name, device_type, date_added FROM device_info_table WHERE device_type LIKE 'phone%' ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE owner_id = 'abc';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, owner_id, location FROM devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY created_at DESC, device_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type, created_at FROM devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM permissions JOIN devices ON permissions.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE permissions.permission_type = 'admin' AND granted = true;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.permission_type FROM users u LEFT JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.permission_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY u.username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, location FROM devices;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type='Smartphone';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = '98765432-10ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT device_name FROM iot_devices ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM iot_devices WHERE owner_id = 5
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM roles WHERE role_id = 3
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM iot_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Office%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN iot_devices d ON u.user_id = d.owner_id JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name;
SELECT u.username AS user, COUNT(a.log_id) AS num_logs FROM users u LEFT JOIN audit_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_logs > 10;
SELECT d.device_name, dp.permission_type, dp.granted_at FROM iot_devices d LEFT JOIN device_permissions dp ON d.id = dp.device_id;
